name: DEININGER Consulting
description:
Successful companies need strong, successful personalities.
 Having the right people at the top is crucial to a company’s success. With that in mind, we give our all for every single project, personally and professionally. Whether you are a multinational player, international organization or individual company, personnel consulting is an investment, and it has to deliver returns. It’s not just about staffing for vacancies in the short term. The goal is to spur lasting positive development at companies and in their management culture. This requires the highest level of professionalism, entrepreneurial foresight and personal experience.
features: INTEGRITY – WE GUARANTEE CONFIDENTIALITY AND INFORM CLIENTS ABOUT POSSIBLE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST IN A SEARCH ASSIGNMENT.
QUALIFICATION – AFTER A THOROUGH ANALYSIS CONDUCTED TOGETHER WITH THE CLIENT, OUR CONSULTANTS DEVELOP A QUALIFIED REQUIREMENTS PROFILE FOR THE VACANT POSITION.
PROFESSIONALISM – ALL CANDIDATES ARE CAREFULLY SELECTED ACCORDING TO OBJECTIVELY DEFINED CRITERIA AND ON THE BASIS OF MANY YEARS OF PERSONAL EXPERIENCE.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Successful companies need strong, successful personalities.
ShortDescription: We are successful personnel consultants, both nationally and internationally.
enhanced_description: DEININGER Consulting specializes in personnel consulting, both nationally and internationally, focusing on executive search and leadership placement to identify and secure strong, successful personalities for companies. Their approach goes beyond short-term staffing, aiming to foster lasting positive development within client companies and their management cultures. This is achieved through a commitment to integrity, qualification, and professionalism, ensuring confidentiality and objective candidate selection based on thorough analysis and extensive personal experience.
key_use_cases: Spurring lasting positive development in companies and their management culture
Hiring top talent faster and more efficiently
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Transparency regarding possible conflicts of interest in search assignments
Thorough analysis with clients to develop qualified requirements profiles
Careful selection of candidates based on objectively defined criteria and extensive personal experience
roi_benefits: Delivers returns on investment in personnel consulting
Spurs lasting positive development at companies and in their management culture
Hires top talent faster and more efficiently
Boosts hiring manager confidence and productivity
compliance_features: Informs clients about possible conflicts of interest
